00053 void BM_data_interp_from_verts(BMesh *bm, BMVert *v1, BMVert *v2, BMVert *v, const float fac)
00054 {
00055     if (v1->head.data && v2->head.data) {
00056         /* first see if we can avoid interpolation */
00057         if (fac <= 0.0f) {
00058             if (v1 == v) {
00059                 /* do nothing */
00060             }
00061             else {
00062                 CustomData_bmesh_free_block(&bm->vdata, &v->head.data);
00063                 CustomData_bmesh_copy_data(&bm->vdata, &bm->vdata, v1->head.data, &v->head.data);
00064             }
00065         }
00066         else if (fac >= 1.0f) {
00067             if (v2 == v) {
00068                 /* do nothing */
00069             }
00070             else {
00071                 CustomData_bmesh_free_block(&bm->vdata, &v->head.data);
00072                 CustomData_bmesh_copy_data(&bm->vdata, &bm->vdata, v2->head.data, &v->head.data);
00073             }
00074         }
00075         else {
00076             void *src[2];
00077             float w[2];
00078 
00079             src[0] = v1->head.data;
00080             src[1] = v2->head.data;
00081             w[0] = 1.0f-fac;
00082             w[1] = fac;
00083             CustomData_bmesh_interp(&bm->vdata, src, w, NULL, 2, v->head.data);
00084         }
00085     }
00086 }

00094 static void UNUSED_FUNCTION(BM_Data_Vert_Average)(BMesh *UNUSED(bm), BMFace *UNUSED(f))
00095 {
00096     // BMIter iter;
00097 }

00105 void BM_data_interp_face_vert_edge(BMesh *bm, BMVert *v1, BMVert *UNUSED(v2), BMVert *v, BMEdge *e1, const float fac)
00106 {
00107     void *src[2];
00108     float w[2];
00109     BMLoop *v1loop = NULL, *vloop = NULL, *v2loop = NULL;
00110     BMLoop *l_iter = NULL;
00111 
00112     if (!e1->l) {
00113         return;
00114     }
00115 
00116     w[1] = 1.0f - fac;
00117     w[0] = fac;
00118 
00119     l_iter = e1->l;
00120     do {
00121         if (l_iter->v == v1) {
00122             v1loop = l_iter;
00123             vloop = v1loop->next;
00124             v2loop = vloop->next;
00125         }
00126         else if (l_iter->v == v) {
00127             v1loop = l_iter->next;
00128             vloop = l_iter;
00129             v2loop = l_iter->prev;
00130         }
00131         
00132         if (!v1loop || !v2loop)
00133             return;
00134         
00135         src[0] = v1loop->head.data;
00136         src[1] = v2loop->head.data;
00137 
00138         CustomData_bmesh_interp(&bm->ldata, src, w, NULL, 2, vloop->head.data);
00139     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->radial_next) != e1->l);
00140 }
00141 
00150 void BM_face_interp_from_face(BMesh *bm, BMFace *target, BMFace *source)
00151 {
00152     BMLoop *l_iter;
00153     BMLoop *l_first;
00154 
00155     void **blocks = NULL;
00156     float (*cos)[3] = NULL, *w = NULL;
00157     BLI_array_fixedstack_declare(cos,     BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE, source->len, __func__);
00158     BLI_array_fixedstack_declare(w,       BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE, source->len, __func__);
00159     BLI_array_fixedstack_declare(blocks,  BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE, source->len, __func__);
00160     int i;
00161     
00162     BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, source, target);
00163 
00164     i = 0;
00165     l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(source);
00166     do {
00167         copy_v3_v3(cos[i], l_iter->v->co);
00168         blocks[i] = l_iter->head.data;
00169         i++;
00170     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00171 
00172     i = 0;
00173     l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(target);
00174     do {
00175         interp_weights_poly_v3(w, cos, source->len, l_iter->v->co);
00176         CustomData_bmesh_interp(&bm->ldata, blocks, w, NULL, source->len, l_iter->head.data);
00177         i++;
00178     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00179 
00180     BLI_array_fixedstack_free(cos);
00181     BLI_array_fixedstack_free(w);
00182     BLI_array_fixedstack_free(blocks);
00183 }
00184 
00198 static int compute_mdisp_quad(BMLoop *l, float v1[3], float v2[3], float v3[3], float v4[3],
00199                               float e1[3], float e2[3])
00200 {
00201     float cent[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f}, n[3], p[3];
00202     BMLoop *l_first;
00203     BMLoop *l_iter;
00204     
00205     /* computer center */
00206     l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(l->f);
00207     do {
00208         cent[0] += (float)l_iter->v->co[0];
00209         cent[1] += (float)l_iter->v->co[1];
00210         cent[2] += (float)l_iter->v->co[2];
00211     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00212     
00213     mul_v3_fl(cent, (1.0 / (float)l->f->len));
00214     
00215     add_v3_v3v3(p, l->prev->v->co, l->v->co);
00216     mul_v3_fl(p, 0.5);
00217     add_v3_v3v3(n, l->next->v->co, l->v->co);
00218     mul_v3_fl(n, 0.5);
00219     
00220     copy_v3_v3(v1, cent);
00221     copy_v3_v3(v2, p);
00222     copy_v3_v3(v3, l->v->co);
00223     copy_v3_v3(v4, n);
00224     
00225     sub_v3_v3v3(e1, v2, v1);
00226     sub_v3_v3v3(e2, v3, v4);
00227     
00228     return 1;
00229 }
00230 
00231 /* funnily enough, I think this is identical to face_to_crn_interp, heh */
00232 static float quad_coord(float aa[3], float bb[3], float cc[3], float dd[3], int a1, int a2)
00233 {
00234     float x, y, z, f1;
00235     
00236     x = aa[a1] * cc[a2] - cc[a1] * aa[a2];
00237     y = aa[a1] * dd[a2] + bb[a1] * cc[a2] - cc[a1] * bb[a2] - dd[a1] * aa[a2];
00238     z = bb[a1] * dd[a2] - dd[a1] * bb[a2];
00239     
00240     if (fabsf(2.0f * (x - y + z)) > FLT_EPSILON * 10.0f) {
00241         float f2;
00242 
00243         f1 = (sqrt(y * y - 4.0 * x * z) - y + 2.0 * z) / (2.0 * (x - y + z));
00244         f2 = (-sqrt(y * y - 4.0 * x * z) - y + 2.0 * z) / (2.0 * (x - y + z));
00245 
00246         f1 = fabsf(f1);
00247         f2 = fabsf(f2);
00248         f1 = MIN2(f1, f2);
00249         CLAMP(f1, 0.0f, 1.0f + FLT_EPSILON);
00250     }
00251     else {
00252         f1 = -z / (y - 2 * z);
00253         CLAMP(f1, 0.0f, 1.0f + FLT_EPSILON);
00254         
00255         if (isnan(f1) || f1 > 1.0 || f1 < 0.0f) {
00256             int i;
00257             
00258             for (i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
00259                 if (fabsf(aa[i]) < FLT_EPSILON * 100.0f)
00260                     return aa[(i + 1) % 2] / fabsf(bb[(i + 1) % 2] - aa[(i + 1) % 2]);
00261                 if (fabsf(cc[i]) < FLT_EPSILON * 100.0f)
00262                     return cc[(i + 1) % 2] / fabsf(dd[(i + 1) % 2] - cc[(i + 1) % 2]);
00263             }
00264         }
00265     }
00266 
00267     return f1;
00268 }
00269 
00270 static int quad_co(float *x, float *y, float v1[3], float v2[3], float v3[3], float v4[3],
00271                    float p[3], float n[3])
00272 {
00273     float projverts[5][3], n2[3];
00274     float dprojverts[4][3], origin[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
00275     int i;
00276 
00277     /* project points into 2d along normal */
00278     copy_v3_v3(projverts[0], v1);
00279     copy_v3_v3(projverts[1], v2);
00280     copy_v3_v3(projverts[2], v3);
00281     copy_v3_v3(projverts[3], v4);
00282     copy_v3_v3(projverts[4], p);
00283 
00284     normal_quad_v3(n2, projverts[0], projverts[1], projverts[2], projverts[3]);
00285 
00286     if (dot_v3v3(n, n2) < -FLT_EPSILON) {
00287         return 0;
00288     }
00289 
00290     /* rotate */
00291     poly_rotate_plane(n, projverts, 5);
00292     
00293     /* flatten */
00294     for (i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
00295         projverts[i][2] = 0.0f;
00296     }
00297     
00298     /* subtract origin */
00299     for (i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
00300         sub_v3_v3(projverts[i], projverts[4]);
00301     }
00302     
00303     copy_v3_v3(dprojverts[0], projverts[0]);
00304     copy_v3_v3(dprojverts[1], projverts[1]);
00305     copy_v3_v3(dprojverts[2], projverts[2]);
00306     copy_v3_v3(dprojverts[3], projverts[3]);
00307 
00308     if (!isect_point_quad_v2(origin, dprojverts[0], dprojverts[1], dprojverts[2], dprojverts[3])) {
00309         return 0;
00310     }
00311     
00312     *y = quad_coord(dprojverts[1], dprojverts[0], dprojverts[2], dprojverts[3], 0, 1);
00313     *x = quad_coord(dprojverts[2], dprojverts[1], dprojverts[3], dprojverts[0], 0, 1);
00314 
00315     return 1;
00316 }
00317 
00318 static void mdisp_axis_from_quad(float v1[3], float v2[3], float UNUSED(v3[3]), float v4[3],
00319                                 float axis_x[3], float axis_y[3])
00320 {
00321     sub_v3_v3v3(axis_x, v4, v1);
00322     sub_v3_v3v3(axis_y, v2, v1);
00323 
00324     normalize_v3(axis_x);
00325     normalize_v3(axis_y);
00326 }
00327 
00328 /* tl is loop to project onto, l is loop whose internal displacement, co, is being
00329  * projected.  x and y are location in loop's mdisps grid of point co. */
00330 static int mdisp_in_mdispquad(BMLoop *l, BMLoop *tl, float p[3], float *x, float *y,
00331                               int res, float axis_x[3], float axis_y[3])
00332 {
00333     float v1[3], v2[3], c[3], v3[3], v4[3], e1[3], e2[3];
00334     float eps = FLT_EPSILON * 4000;
00335     
00336     if (len_v3(l->v->no) == 0.0f)
00337         BM_vert_normal_update_all(l->v);
00338     if (len_v3(tl->v->no) == 0.0f)
00339         BM_vert_normal_update_all(tl->v);
00340 
00341     compute_mdisp_quad(tl, v1, v2, v3, v4, e1, e2);
00342 
00343     /* expand quad a bit */
00344     cent_quad_v3(c, v1, v2, v3, v4);
00345     
00346     sub_v3_v3(v1, c); sub_v3_v3(v2, c);
00347     sub_v3_v3(v3, c); sub_v3_v3(v4, c);
00348     mul_v3_fl(v1, 1.0 + eps); mul_v3_fl(v2, 1.0 + eps);
00349     mul_v3_fl(v3, 1.0 + eps); mul_v3_fl(v4, 1.0 + eps);
00350     add_v3_v3(v1, c); add_v3_v3(v2, c);
00351     add_v3_v3(v3, c); add_v3_v3(v4, c);
00352     
00353     if (!quad_co(x, y, v1, v2, v3, v4, p, l->v->no))
00354         return 0;
00355     
00356     *x *= res - 1;
00357     *y *= res - 1;
00358 
00359     mdisp_axis_from_quad(v1, v2, v3, v4, axis_x, axis_y);
00360 
00361     return 1;
00362 }
00363 
00364 static float bm_loop_flip_equotion(float mat[2][2], float b[2], float target_axis_x[3], float target_axis_y[3],
00365                                    float coord[3], int i, int j)
00366 {
00367     mat[0][0] = target_axis_x[i];
00368     mat[0][1] = target_axis_y[i];
00369     mat[1][0] = target_axis_x[j];
00370     mat[1][1] = target_axis_y[j];
00371     b[0] = coord[i];
00372     b[1] = coord[j];
00373 
00374     return mat[0][0] * mat[1][1] - mat[0][1] * mat[1][0];
00375 }
00376 
00377 static void bm_loop_flip_disp(float source_axis_x[3], float source_axis_y[3],
00378                                  float target_axis_x[3], float target_axis_y[3], float disp[3])
00379 {
00380     float vx[3], vy[3], coord[3];
00381     float n[3], vec[3];
00382     float b[2], mat[2][2], d;
00383 
00384     mul_v3_v3fl(vx, source_axis_x, disp[0]);
00385     mul_v3_v3fl(vy, source_axis_y, disp[1]);
00386     add_v3_v3v3(coord, vx, vy);
00387 
00388     /* project displacement from source grid plane onto target grid plane */
00389     cross_v3_v3v3(n, target_axis_x, target_axis_y);
00390     project_v3_v3v3(vec, coord, n);
00391     sub_v3_v3v3(coord, coord, vec);
00392 
00393     d = bm_loop_flip_equotion(mat, b, target_axis_x, target_axis_y, coord, 0, 1);
00394 
00395     if (fabsf(d) < 1e-4) {
00396         d = bm_loop_flip_equotion(mat, b, target_axis_x, target_axis_y, coord, 0, 2);
00397         if (fabsf(d) < 1e-4)
00398             d = bm_loop_flip_equotion(mat, b, target_axis_x, target_axis_y, coord, 1, 2);
00399     }
00400 
00401     disp[0] = (b[0] * mat[1][1] - mat[0][1] * b[1]) / d;
00402     disp[1] = (mat[0][0] * b[1] - b[0] * mat[1][0]) / d;
00403 }
00404 
00405 static void bm_loop_interp_mdisps(BMesh *bm, BMLoop *target, BMFace *source)
00406 {
00407     MDisps *mdisps;
00408     BMLoop *l_iter;
00409     BMLoop *l_first;
00410     float x, y, d, v1[3], v2[3], v3[3], v4[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f}, e1[3], e2[3];
00411     int ix, iy, res;
00412     float axis_x[3], axis_y[3];
00413     
00414     /* ignore 2-edged faces */
00415     if (target->f->len < 3)
00416         return;
00417     
00418     if (!CustomData_has_layer(&bm->ldata, CD_MDISPS))
00419         return;
00420     
00421     mdisps = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, target->head.data, CD_MDISPS);
00422     compute_mdisp_quad(target, v1, v2, v3, v4, e1, e2);
00423     
00424     /* if no disps data allocate a new grid, the size of the first grid in source. */
00425     if (!mdisps->totdisp) {
00426         MDisps *md2 = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(source)->head.data, CD_MDISPS);
00427         
00428         mdisps->totdisp = md2->totdisp;
00429         mdisps->level = md2->level;
00430         if (mdisps->totdisp) {
00431             mdisps->disps = MEM_callocN(sizeof(float) * 3 * mdisps->totdisp,
00432                                         "mdisp->disps in bmesh_loop_intern_mdisps");
00433         }
00434         else {
00435             return;
00436         }
00437     }
00438     
00439     mdisp_axis_from_quad(v1, v2, v3, v4, axis_x, axis_y);
00440 
00441     res = (int)sqrt(mdisps->totdisp);
00442     d = 1.0 / (float)(res - 1);
00443     for (x = 0.0f, ix = 0; ix < res; x += d, ix++) {
00444         for (y = 0.0f, iy = 0; iy < res; y += d, iy++) {
00445             float co1[3], co2[3], co[3];
00446             
00447             copy_v3_v3(co1, e1);
00448             
00449             mul_v3_fl(co1, y);
00450             add_v3_v3(co1, v1);
00451             
00452             copy_v3_v3(co2, e2);
00453             mul_v3_fl(co2, y);
00454             add_v3_v3(co2, v4);
00455             
00456             sub_v3_v3v3(co, co2, co1);
00457             mul_v3_fl(co, x);
00458             add_v3_v3(co, co1);
00459             
00460             l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(source);
00461             do {
00462                 float x2, y2;
00463                 MDisps *md1, *md2;
00464                 float src_axis_x[3], src_axis_y[3];
00465 
00466                 md1 = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, target->head.data, CD_MDISPS);
00467                 md2 = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l_iter->head.data, CD_MDISPS);
00468                 
00469                 if (mdisp_in_mdispquad(target, l_iter, co, &x2, &y2, res, src_axis_x, src_axis_y)) {
00470                     old_mdisps_bilinear(md1->disps[iy * res + ix], md2->disps, res, (float)x2, (float)y2);
00471                     bm_loop_flip_disp(src_axis_x, src_axis_y, axis_x, axis_y, md1->disps[iy * res + ix]);
00472 
00473                     break;
00474                 }
00475             } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00476         }
00477     }
00478 }
00479 
00484 void BM_face_multires_bounds_smooth(BMesh *bm, BMFace *f)
00485 {
00486     BMLoop *l;
00487     BMIter liter;
00488     
00489     if (!CustomData_has_layer(&bm->ldata, CD_MDISPS))
00490         return;
00491     
00492     BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00493         MDisps *mdp = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l->prev->head.data, CD_MDISPS);
00494         MDisps *mdl = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MDISPS);
00495         MDisps *mdn = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l->next->head.data, CD_MDISPS);
00496         float co1[3];
00497         int sides;
00498         int y;
00499         
00500         /*
00501          *  mdisps is a grid of displacements, ordered thus:
00502          *
00503          *                     v4/next
00504          *                       |
00505          *   |      v1/cent-----mid2 ---> x
00506          *   |         |         |
00507          *   |         |         |
00508          *  v2/prev---mid1-----v3/cur
00509          *             |
00510          *             V
00511          *             y
00512          */
00513 
00514         sides = (int)sqrt(mdp->totdisp);
00515         for (y = 0; y < sides; y++) {
00516             add_v3_v3v3(co1, mdn->disps[y * sides], mdl->disps[y]);
00517             mul_v3_fl(co1, 0.5);
00518 
00519             copy_v3_v3(mdn->disps[y * sides], co1);
00520             copy_v3_v3(mdl->disps[y], co1);
00521         }
00522     }
00523     
00524     BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, f, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00525         MDisps *mdl1 = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l->head.data, CD_MDISPS);
00526         MDisps *mdl2;
00527         float co1[3], co2[3], co[3];
00528         int sides;
00529         int y;
00530         
00531         /*
00532          *  mdisps is a grid of displacements, ordered thus:
00533          *
00534          *                     v4/next
00535          *                       |
00536          *   |      v1/cent-----mid2 ---> x
00537          *   |         |         |
00538          *   |         |         |
00539          *  v2/prev---mid1-----v3/cur
00540          *             |
00541          *             V
00542          *             y
00543          */
00544 
00545         if (l->radial_next == l)
00546             continue;
00547 
00548         if (l->radial_next->v == l->v)
00549             mdl2 = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l->radial_next->head.data, CD_MDISPS);
00550         else
00551             mdl2 = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l->radial_next->next->head.data, CD_MDISPS);
00552 
00553         sides = (int)sqrt(mdl1->totdisp);
00554         for (y = 0; y < sides; y++) {
00555             int a1, a2, o1, o2;
00556             
00557             if (l->v != l->radial_next->v) {
00558                 a1 = sides * y + sides - 2;
00559                 a2 = (sides - 2) * sides + y;
00560                 
00561                 o1 = sides * y + sides - 1;
00562                 o2 = (sides - 1) * sides + y;
00563             }
00564             else {
00565                 a1 = sides * y + sides - 2;
00566                 a2 = sides * y + sides - 2;
00567                 o1 = sides * y + sides - 1;
00568                 o2 = sides * y + sides - 1;
00569             }
00570             
00571             /* magic blending numbers, hardcoded! */
00572             add_v3_v3v3(co1, mdl1->disps[a1], mdl2->disps[a2]);
00573             mul_v3_fl(co1, 0.18);
00574             
00575             add_v3_v3v3(co2, mdl1->disps[o1], mdl2->disps[o2]);
00576             mul_v3_fl(co2, 0.32);
00577             
00578             add_v3_v3v3(co, co1, co2);
00579             
00580             copy_v3_v3(mdl1->disps[o1], co);
00581             copy_v3_v3(mdl2->disps[o2], co);
00582         }
00583     }
00584 }
00585 
00589 void BM_loop_interp_multires(BMesh *bm, BMLoop *target, BMFace *source)
00590 {
00591     bm_loop_interp_mdisps(bm, target, source);
00592 }
00593 
00598 void BM_loop_interp_from_face(BMesh *bm, BMLoop *target, BMFace *source,
00599                               int do_vertex, int do_multires)
00600 {
00601     BMLoop *l_iter;
00602     BMLoop *l_first;
00603     void **blocks = NULL;
00604     void **vblocks = NULL;
00605     float (*cos)[3] = NULL, co[3], *w = NULL;
00606     float cent[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
00607     BLI_array_fixedstack_declare(cos,      BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE, source->len, __func__);
00608     BLI_array_fixedstack_declare(w,        BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE, source->len, __func__);
00609     BLI_array_fixedstack_declare(blocks,   BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE, source->len, __func__);
00610     BLI_array_fixedstack_declare(vblocks,  BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE, do_vertex ? source->len : 0, __func__);
00611     int i, ax, ay;
00612 
00613     BM_elem_attrs_copy(bm, bm, source, target->f);
00614 
00615     i = 0;
00616     l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(source);
00617     do {
00618         copy_v3_v3(cos[i], l_iter->v->co);
00619         add_v3_v3(cent, cos[i]);
00620 
00621         w[i] = 0.0f;
00622         blocks[i] = l_iter->head.data;
00623 
00624         if (do_vertex) {
00625             vblocks[i] = l_iter->v->head.data;
00626         }
00627         i++;
00628 
00629     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00630 
00631     /* find best projection of face XY, XZ or YZ: barycentric weights of
00632      * the 2d projected coords are the same and faster to compute */
00633 
00634     axis_dominant_v3(&ax, &ay, source->no);
00635 
00636     /* scale source face coordinates a bit, so points sitting directly on an
00637      * edge will work. */
00638     mul_v3_fl(cent, 1.0f / (float)source->len);
00639     for (i = 0; i < source->len; i++) {
00640         float vec[3], tmp[3];
00641         sub_v3_v3v3(vec, cent, cos[i]);
00642         mul_v3_fl(vec, 0.001f);
00643         add_v3_v3(cos[i], vec);
00644 
00645         copy_v3_v3(tmp, cos[i]);
00646         cos[i][0] = tmp[ax];
00647         cos[i][1] = tmp[ay];
00648         cos[i][2] = 0.0f;
00649     }
00650 
00651 
00652     /* interpolate */
00653     co[0] = target->v->co[ax];
00654     co[1] = target->v->co[ay];
00655     co[2] = 0.0f;
00656 
00657     interp_weights_poly_v3(w, cos, source->len, co);
00658     CustomData_bmesh_interp(&bm->ldata, blocks, w, NULL, source->len, target->head.data);
00659     if (do_vertex) {
00660         CustomData_bmesh_interp(&bm->vdata, vblocks, w, NULL, source->len, target->v->head.data);
00661         BLI_array_fixedstack_free(vblocks);
00662     }
00663 
00664     BLI_array_fixedstack_free(cos);
00665     BLI_array_fixedstack_free(w);
00666     BLI_array_fixedstack_free(blocks);
00667 
00668     if (do_multires) {
00669         if (CustomData_has_layer(&bm->ldata, CD_MDISPS)) {
00670             bm_loop_interp_mdisps(bm, target, source);
00671         }
00672     }
00673 }
00674 
00675 
00676 void BM_vert_interp_from_face(BMesh *bm, BMVert *v, BMFace *source)
00677 {
00678     BMLoop *l_iter;
00679     BMLoop *l_first;
00680     void **blocks = NULL;
00681     float (*cos)[3] = NULL, *w = NULL;
00682     float cent[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
00683     BLI_array_fixedstack_declare(cos,      BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE, source->len, __func__);
00684     BLI_array_fixedstack_declare(w,        BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE, source->len, __func__);
00685     BLI_array_fixedstack_declare(blocks,   BM_NGON_STACK_SIZE, source->len, __func__);
00686     int i;
00687 
00688     i = 0;
00689     l_iter = l_first = BM_FACE_FIRST_LOOP(source);
00690     do {
00691         copy_v3_v3(cos[i], l_iter->v->co);
00692         add_v3_v3(cent, cos[i]);
00693 
00694         w[i] = 0.0f;
00695         blocks[i] = l_iter->v->head.data;
00696         i++;
00697     } while ((l_iter = l_iter->next) != l_first);
00698 
00699     /* scale source face coordinates a bit, so points sitting directly on an
00700      * edge will work. */
00701     mul_v3_fl(cent, 1.0f / (float)source->len);
00702     for (i = 0; i < source->len; i++) {
00703         float vec[3];
00704         sub_v3_v3v3(vec, cent, cos[i]);
00705         mul_v3_fl(vec, 0.01f);
00706         add_v3_v3(cos[i], vec);
00707     }
00708 
00709     /* interpolate */
00710     interp_weights_poly_v3(w, cos, source->len, v->co);
00711     CustomData_bmesh_interp(&bm->vdata, blocks, w, NULL, source->len, v->head.data);
00712 
00713     BLI_array_fixedstack_free(cos);
00714     BLI_array_fixedstack_free(w);
00715     BLI_array_fixedstack_free(blocks);
00716 }
00717 
00718 static void update_data_blocks(BMesh *bm, CustomData *olddata, CustomData *data)
00719 {
00720     BMIter iter;
00721     BLI_mempool *oldpool = olddata->pool;
00722     void *block;
00723 
00724     if (data == &bm->vdata) {
00725         BMVert *eve;
00726 
00727         CustomData_bmesh_init_pool(data, bm->totvert, BM_VERT);
00728 
00729         BM_ITER_MESH (eve, &iter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00730             block = NULL;
00731             CustomData_bmesh_set_default(data, &block);
00732             CustomData_bmesh_copy_data(olddata, data, eve->head.data, &block);
00733             CustomData_bmesh_free_block(olddata, &eve->head.data);
00734             eve->head.data = block;
00735         }
00736     }
00737     else if (data == &bm->edata) {
00738         BMEdge *eed;
00739 
00740         CustomData_bmesh_init_pool(data, bm->totedge, BM_EDGE);
00741 
00742         BM_ITER_MESH (eed, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00743             block = NULL;
00744             CustomData_bmesh_set_default(data, &block);
00745             CustomData_bmesh_copy_data(olddata, data, eed->head.data, &block);
00746             CustomData_bmesh_free_block(olddata, &eed->head.data);
00747             eed->head.data = block;
00748         }
00749     }
00750     else if (data == &bm->ldata) {
00751         BMIter liter;
00752         BMFace *efa;
00753         BMLoop *l;
00754 
00755         CustomData_bmesh_init_pool(data, bm->totloop, BM_LOOP);
00756         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00757             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, efa, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00758                 block = NULL;
00759                 CustomData_bmesh_set_default(data, &block);
00760                 CustomData_bmesh_copy_data(olddata, data, l->head.data, &block);
00761                 CustomData_bmesh_free_block(olddata, &l->head.data);
00762                 l->head.data = block;
00763             }
00764         }
00765     }
00766     else if (data == &bm->pdata) {
00767         BMFace *efa;
00768 
00769         CustomData_bmesh_init_pool(data, bm->totface, BM_FACE);
00770 
00771         BM_ITER_MESH (efa, &iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00772             block = NULL;
00773             CustomData_bmesh_set_default(data, &block);
00774             CustomData_bmesh_copy_data(olddata, data, efa->head.data, &block);
00775             CustomData_bmesh_free_block(olddata, &efa->head.data);
00776             efa->head.data = block;
00777         }
00778     }
00779     else {
00780         /* should never reach this! */
00781         BLI_assert(0);
00782     }
00783 
00784     if (oldpool) {
00785         /* this should never happen but can when dissolve fails - [#28960] */
00786         BLI_assert(data->pool != oldpool);
00787 
00788         BLI_mempool_destroy(oldpool);
00789     }
00790 }
00791 
00792 void BM_data_layer_add(BMesh *bm, CustomData *data, int type)
00793 {
00794     CustomData olddata;
00795 
00796     olddata = *data;
00797     olddata.layers = (olddata.layers) ? MEM_dupallocN(olddata.layers): NULL;
00798 
00799     /* the pool is now owned by olddata and must not be shared */
00800     data->pool = NULL;
00801 
00802     CustomData_add_layer(data, type, CD_DEFAULT, NULL, 0);
00803 
00804     update_data_blocks(bm, &olddata, data);
00805     if (olddata.layers) MEM_freeN(olddata.layers);
00806 }
00807 
00808 void BM_data_layer_add_named(BMesh *bm, CustomData *data, int type, const char *name)
00809 {
00810     CustomData olddata;
00811 
00812     olddata = *data;
00813     olddata.layers = (olddata.layers) ? MEM_dupallocN(olddata.layers): NULL;
00814 
00815     /* the pool is now owned by olddata and must not be shared */
00816     data->pool = NULL;
00817 
00818     CustomData_add_layer_named(data, type, CD_DEFAULT, NULL, 0, name);
00819 
00820     update_data_blocks(bm, &olddata, data);
00821     if (olddata.layers) MEM_freeN(olddata.layers);
00822 }
00823 
00824 void BM_data_layer_free(BMesh *bm, CustomData *data, int type)
00825 {
00826     CustomData olddata;
00827 
00828     olddata = *data;
00829     olddata.layers = (olddata.layers) ? MEM_dupallocN(olddata.layers): NULL;
00830 
00831     /* the pool is now owned by olddata and must not be shared */
00832     data->pool = NULL;
00833 
00834     CustomData_free_layer_active(data, type, 0);
00835 
00836     update_data_blocks(bm, &olddata, data);
00837     if (olddata.layers) MEM_freeN(olddata.layers);
00838 }
00839 
00840 void BM_data_layer_free_n(BMesh *bm, CustomData *data, int type, int n)
00841 {
00842     CustomData olddata;
00843 
00844     olddata = *data;
00845     olddata.layers = (olddata.layers) ? MEM_dupallocN(olddata.layers): NULL;
00846 
00847     /* the pool is now owned by olddata and must not be shared */
00848     data->pool = NULL;
00849 
00850     CustomData_free_layer(data, type, 0, CustomData_get_layer_index_n(data, type, n));
00851     
00852     update_data_blocks(bm, &olddata, data);
00853     if (olddata.layers) MEM_freeN(olddata.layers);
00854 }

00856 float BM_elem_float_data_get(CustomData *cd, void *element, int type)
00857 {
00858     float *f = CustomData_bmesh_get(cd, ((BMHeader *)element)->data, type);
00859     return f ? *f : 0.0f;
00860 }
00861 
00862 void BM_elem_float_data_set(CustomData *cd, void *element, int type, const float val)
00863 {
00864     float *f = CustomData_bmesh_get(cd, ((BMHeader *)element)->data, type);
00865     if (f) *f = val;
00866 }
